## Master thesis and semester projects

Are you excited about machine learning applied to chemical sciences? If you interested in a Master thesis or semester project, please contact Prof. Philippe Schwaller via email.

In our lab you can learn how to extract/scrape chemical data, handle it using Python and learn the underlying features using machine learning. 

## PhD and Postdoc positions
